JOB DESCRIPTION:
Job Title /  Designation: Junior Development Engineer Job Description : -  Software program development using C++, VB,  VC++,  .Net

-  Main working domain will be CAD Customization

-  Flexibility to work in a changing and evolving role and environment 0 -  1 Year Number of Vacancies IT Software -  Application Programming,  Maintenance Job Role Qualifications BE/ B.Tech (Any Specialization),  MSC (Computer Science),  MCA Candidate Profile : -  Minimum of 60% marks secured in Under Graduate or in Post Graduate. 

-  Strong programming skills in C++ is required.

-  Excellent knowledge in OOP concepts.
